Who We Are Des: Hefazat-e-Islam is a leading Islamic organization dedicated to preserving the purity of Islamic education, strengthening Islamic institutions, and fostering unity within the Muslim community.
Who We Are Des Two: Established by renowned Islamic scholars (ulama) and community leaders, we aim to promote moral guidance, justice, peace, and compassion in conformity with the Qur’ān and Sunnah.
Our Mission Des: To empower Muslims through education, service, and unity — following the path of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم — and to protect Islamic traditions while addressing the moral and social challenges of our time.
Message Title: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Message Des: As we strive to guide our community toward justice, peace, unity, and moral purity, we must remain firm upon the Qur’ān and Sunnah.
Message Des Two: Hefazat-e-Islam stands as a guardian of Islamic education, institutions, and values — upholding the rich traditions that enable us to raise a generation anchored in knowledge, compassion, and fairness.
Message Des Three: We invite all Muslims to join us in this mission, to contribute to a future forged by strong faith, strong character, and unity under the guidance of Islam.
Ongoing Projects Des: At Hefazat-e-Islam, we’re constantly engaged in initiatives that make a real, positive difference in our community.
Events Des: At Hefazat-e-Islam, we bring our community together through a range of meaningful events — fostering unity, education, collaboration, and compassion.
Get Involved Title: Hefazat-e-Islam invites you to become a part of this mission.
Get Involved Des: Together, we can make a difference by strengthening our community, upholding justice, and spreading compassion.
Footer Title: Guiding our community toward knowledge, unity, justice, and peace in Islam.
Support the Mission of Faith, Unity & Se: Support the Mission of Faith, Unity & Service
Support Des: At Hefazat-e-Islam, your donation is more than charity — it’s an investment in faith, education, and a just society. Every contribution goes directly to supporting Islamic education, community welfare, and the empowerment of the next generation.
Contribution Des: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed of grain which grows seven ears, in every ear a hundred grains.
Careers Banner Title: Join a Mission Bigger Than a Job
Careers Banner Des: At Hefazat-e-Islam, we are more than just an organization — we are a movement built on faith, service, and community transformation.
Careers Banner Des Two: We invite individuals who are passionate about Islamic values, education, and humanitarian work to become a part of our dedicated team.
Careers Banner Des Three: Whether you are a scholar, teacher, administrator, tech professional, or volunteer — your skills can make a difference here.
Opportunities Available Des: We regularly seek passionate individuals for the following roles:
About Banner Title: A Movement Rooted in Knowledge and Service
About Banner Des: Hefazat-e-Islam is more than just an organization — it is a movement grounded in Islamic knowledge (Ilm), sincere da'wah, and unwavering service to the Muslim ummah.
About Banner Des Two: Founded in 2010, our mission began with one goal: to protect and promote authentic Islamic education and values in the face of rising moral, social, and ideological challenges.
About Banner Des Three: Over the years, we’ve grown into a trusted name in Bangladesh — not just as protectors of madrasas and mosques, but as mentors, mobilizers, and educators serving the needs of both scholars and ordinary Muslims.
Our Story Des: Our roots lie in the traditional madrasas of Bangladesh — institutions that have produced generations of learned scholars, imams, and educators.
Our Story Des Two: But we recognized the urgent need to bridge tradition with the modern world — to protect Islamic identity while providing skills and tools for self-reliance and leadership in today’s society.
Our Story Des Three: From small gatherings in local mosques to nationwide programs and community development efforts — our journey is driven by sincerity, unity, and trust in Allah.
Looking Ahead One: Expand our support to madrasas across the country
Looking Ahead Two: Launch digital platforms for Islamic learning and community support
Looking Ahead Three: Train a new generation of leaders who are grounded in both deen and dunya
Looking Ahead Four: Foster peace and moral strength in every household
